definitions.consumer prices index: all items consumer prices index published by the Statistics Board
definitions.relevant power: the power in section 9(2) of the Welfare Reform Act 2012 or the power in section 150(2)(b) of the Social Security Administration Act 1992
definitions.standard allowance: the allowance to be included in an award of universal credit under section 9(1) of the Welfare Reform Act 2012
definitions.tax year: the 12 months beginning with 6 April in any year
definitions.LCWRA element: limited capability for work and work-related activity element

obligations.Secretary of State: must exercise a relevant power to secure that the amounts of the standard allowance for tax years 2026-27 to 2029-30 are at least the amounts calculated
obligations.Department for Communities in Northern I: must exercise a relevant power to secure that the amounts of the standard allowance for tax years 2026-27 to 2029-30 are at least the amounts calculated

responsibilities.Secretary of State: must increase the protected LCWRA amount or any amount of the standard allowance for tax years 2026-27 to 2029-30
responsibilities.Department for Communities in Northern I: must increase the protected LCWRA amount or any amount of the standard allowance for tax years 2026-27 to 2029-30

standard allowance.2026-27: amounts of the standard allowance for tax year 2025-26
standard allowance.2027-28: increased by relevant CPI percentage and uplift percentage
standard allowance.2028-29: increased by relevant CPI percentage and uplift percentage
standard allowance.2029-30: increased by relevant CPI percentage and uplift percentage
